entry.title: Blended Learning Option Starting Fall 2014
entry.summary:
BLENDED LEARNING OPTION STARTING FALL 2014
Designed for nurses to “get their feet wet” by easing into the online learning environment Three nursing courses offered in blended learning format that combines face-to-face and online activities Faculty dedicated to assisting the transition into online learning
For more information: RN-BSN Blended Flyer
entry.content:
BLENDED LEARNING OPTION STARTING FALL 2014

  • Designed for nurses to “get their feet wet” by easing into the online learning environment
  • Three nursing courses offered in blended learning format that combines face-to-face and online activities
  • Faculty dedicated to assisting the transition into online learning

For more information:

RN-BSN Blended Flyer

entry.title: Scholarship Opportunity for Adult Students in Scholastic Transition
entry.summary: The Adult Student in Scholastic Transition (ASIST) scholarship is a nondiscriminatory, educational scholarship program for the benefit of nontraditional students provided by the Columbus Chapter of Executive Women International (EWI). The goal of the ASIST Program is to enablerecipients to improve their self-esteem and to have a positive impact onthe recipient’s personal life, employment, family [...]
entry.content:
The Adult Student in Scholastic Transition (ASIST) scholarship is a nondiscriminatory, educational scholarship program for the benefit of nontraditional students provided by the Columbus Chapter of Executive Women International (EWI). The goal of the ASIST Program is to enablerecipients to improve their self-esteem and to have a positive impact onthe recipient’s personal life, employment, family and community.
Applicants must meet the following eligibility requirements:
 Clearly define career goals and objectives.
 Specify the educational requirements to attain the above goals and objectives.
 Utilize re-entry programs available through colleges/universities, community
agencies and service groups or career professionals.
 Applicants must be 18 years or older.
 Applicants must reside in either Franklin, Fairfield, Licking, Union, Pickaway,
Madison or Delaware County.

The application deadline is March 28, 2014.
For more information or to apply, visit:

www.ewicol.org>
